headline: Biggest Deal Ever
abstract: The initial deal between the United States and China is eclipsed by several others in size — including one negotiated under his administration.
lead_paragraph: “Nobody has ever seen anything like it. This is the biggest deal there is anywhere in the world by far and that is good. We are doing another big one next week. But this is the biggest deal anybody has ever seen.”— President Trump, at the signing of the initial trade deal with China on Wednesday
